TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PointConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 將 物件從某一個資料型別轉換為另一個資料型別。

span.span: Converts a object from one data type to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別通常用來建立具有類型的內容控制項的設計階段體驗，並用來將點轉換成字串以便在設計工具中顯示，並將設計工具中輸入的字串轉換物件。The class is typically used for creating a design-time experience for controls that have properties that are of type , and is used to convert points to strings for display in a designer and to convert strings entered in a designer to a object. 這個類別可透過 物件來存取。Access this class through the object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用而運算子。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and the operator. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 此程式碼貼入表單並呼叫`ShowPointConverter`方法時處理表單事件，傳遞`e`做為。Paste this code into a form and call the `ShowPointConverter` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Converters#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Converters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Converters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context`參數可用來取得這個轉換子呼叫環境的其他資訊。The `context` parameter can be used to get additional information about the environment this converter is being called from. 這可能是 `null`，所以您要隨時檢查。This can be `null`, so you should always check. 此外，內容物件上的屬性也可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can also return `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常用於轉換的型別為相互轉換字串物件。The most common types to convert are to and from a string object. 預設實作會呼叫物件的方法的物件是否有效，而且如果目的型別是字串。The default implementation calls the object's method if the object is valid and if the destination type is string. 如果這個方法無法轉換成目的型別，這將會擲回例外狀況。If this method cannot convert to the destination type, this will throw a exception.

span.span: The conversion cannot be completed.

span.span: The newly created object, or if the object could not be created.
The default implementation returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用於不變但是仍然想要提供可變屬性的物件。 is useful for objects that are immutable but still want to provide changeable properties.
